divs: sighting detailsthe encounter was a the eve of palm sunday,2006. the day was filled with making pieogies, as per usual for easter sunday. i was not exhausted, everyone went to bed and i laid on my sofa and fell asleep. i know i was lying on my back with my left arm toward the back of the couch. during the night i felt a sting of what i can think of as an injection, it semi-woke me and on impulse, pushed it away,it was a continuos series of at least 6-7 times, with me doing the same thing, pushing it away. the injections were so sharp, like that of a tetnus shot, but i was still in such a sleep, but not in dream like state. the next morning i went to get up to make breakfast and when i stood i was so dizzy, i thought i had a stroke (i just turned 50 this mar.) i could not stand vertically and was only comfortable in a horizontal postion, so i laid in bed most of the day watching tv. it wasn't untill hours later that my arm started throbbing and everything from the middle of the night came back to me. and a very "strong" intuitive voice said "aliens". the thing about it is that it does not "bother" me, mentally, physically, yes, every day. i can stand or walk by a radio or cd player that is not operating and will get a buzzing sound, a broken up buzzing, like a telgraph sound and when that happens the energy from the radio will act in the same way within my arm. my husband believes me (a mechanical engineer) and sees how i re-act when the buzzing sounds, others i have told also see how i react and hear the buzzing(?) sound. it hurts! i have tried to make contact with other sites and even some guys that my friend (a well-known psychic) i had written to and no answers. so i left it and live with it. until recently...my arm is so sore and is in a constant throb, exactly where the site is on my arm. my arm is so heavy, which is not good for a hair stylist and yoga instructor. this past sat. aug.2, was the worst day with this...it just hurt so bad and throbbed and throbbed, just one small area. when i woke sunday morning and was reading the newspaper out on my patio i felt sooo tired immediately and went over to my yard swing and fell asleep for 2 1\2 hours, got up went to bed for another 2 hours...i was out of it for 2 days, and the site on my arm is still quite noticable, more than usual for the past two years. i have no clue what is going on. the only person i talked to outside my immediate family and friends was my chiropractor, thinking he could have it x-rayed, well that did not pan out...lol..he left town. i did look on your homepage for people that can help, but no one is near me. also while reading your web-page (mostly all of it) there is a part on medical(?). i do not know if this story pertains to anything, i just find it odd that 3 people had said the same thing. twenty-five yrs ago,after my fourth son, i had a tubal ligation after delivery. last september i woke at 3 in the morning with such pangs in my lower abdomin that i went to the emergency room. there they gave me an internal scan of everything and the tech asked me when i had a hysterectomy, and i said i never had one, she dismissed it with ovaries being hidden. so with much "new" health issues i went to all new dr.s and my ob-gyn during exam had asked me when i had a hysterectomy, again, i said i never had one...she just went oh, and left it at that. with me being on the holistic side i went to an iridologist and the first thing she asked my after examining my eyes...is..when did you have a hysterectomy? wow...three different people in three weeks. i do and am taking this so serious and am wondering if you can lead me in any directions to resolve this mystery. like i said, i am not frightened, curious, oh yes! my site is throbbing as i write. thank you for anything you can do and for your time. lee
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Buffalo
There were no other sightings in Buffalo on or around April 17th 2006
Summary: When I was asleep on my couch, I was awoken by 6-7 injections in my left arm...whatever it is. is still there in my left arm..
